pr_title: DB-10483 DEC[IMAL] functions round DECFLOAT instead of truncating it.

timeline.message: DB-10483 DEC[IMAL] functions round DECFLOAT instead of truncating it.

timeline.bodyText: How was this rounding mode picked?  Normal rounding (as done in math class, or in spark) uses ROUND_HALF_UP I believe.
timeline.author: msirek

replies.bodyText: Found out in the standup ROUND_HALF_EVEN is the DB2 default.
replies.author: msirek
